= Baye's Rule =

{{$
P(B|A) = \frac{P(B)}{P(A)} P(A|B)
}}$

== Proof ==

{{$%align%
P(A|B) &= \frac{P(A \land B)}{P(B)} \\
P(B|A) &= \frac{P(B \land A)}{P(A)} \\
\frac{P(B|A)}{P(A|B)} &= \frac{P(B \land A) P(B)}{P(A \land B) P(A)} \\
P(A \land B) &= P(B \land A) \\
\frac{P(B|A)}{P(A|B)} &= \frac{P(B)}{P(A)} \\
P(B|A) &= \frac{P(B)}{P(A)} P(A|B)
}}$
